message: Bob, I'm offering you the opportunity to purchase a valuable asset that I believe holds significant potential for you. I'm confident it can be a great addition to your existing operations. While I value this product at no less than $800000, I'm willing to offer it to you at a price of $1000000. This represents a significant opportunity for you to acquire a unique asset at a competitive price.  Consider this offer carefully, as I have a backup buyer ready to purchase it for $800000 if you decline.
